item.title: Need help for delta, rep++ :)
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

The ^ is pointing at “wildLevel”. wildyLevel is a variable in your Client or Player class? So you need to tell the server to look in Client/Player.java so you can access the wildLevel variable because you are currently in Commands.java.

client.wildyLevel should fix it. Just a guess.

You can only access variables and methods inside the class you are already in unless you tell the server to look else where, like the above.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help for delta, rep++ :)
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

i almost got it… but i still get 1 error:

.\org\model\commands\Commands.java:85: error: cannot find symbol if (wildyLevel <= 20) { ^ symbol: variable wildyLevel location: class Commands 1 error by adding this command:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (wildyLevel <= 20) { client.toX = 3088; client.toY = 3488; client.sM("You teleport Home."); } else { client.sM("You cannot teleport past level 20 wilderness."); } i dont understand what the error sais i should change or what… :S do anyone see what i should fix now? o.O

@deathschaos9 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (wildyLevel <= 20) { toX = 3088; toY = 3488; sM("You teleport Home."); } else { sM("You cannot teleport past level 20 wilderness."); } }

Tadaa

item.title: Need help for delta, rep++ :)
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

how do i get this command so its not impossible to tele out of wildy before you are under lvl 20 wildy?

this is the command: if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { client.toX = 3088; client.toY = 3488; client.sM("You teleport Home"); } if you help me i will rep++ you, + that i will set you on the credits list when im done with the server
